msbt.message: I can't properly entertain you at the moment, but you're welcome to make yourself comfortable. Just, don't go and do anything strange simply because this is a dream, . Actually, darling, I take that back. Now is the perfect time to do something weird.
You do realize this is my private dream space.And yet, here you are regardless, .
Welcome to Chez ! Let's just call it my dream home, shall we, .

Everything just feels so normal, darlingyet totally NOT normal at the same time.I mean, this is a dream, so I suppose that's to be expected, .If the walls of my home suddenly turned into , I suppose that would feel normal too.
I hope you don't get the wrong idea when I tell you that you're looking rather dreamy, . It's justthis IS a dream, so the description seems rather apt right now, .

Can you believe it? Here we are in a dream, and ALL I want to do is entertain visitors in lavish style And yetwhere is my castle? Where is my palace? Where is my ROYAL ESTATE?! Alas, this dream home of mine is infuriatingly realistic, .
